class.name: gov.nih.nci.cbiit.scimgmt.gs.domain.hibernate.FormQuestionAnswers
class.comment: The value of the answers to the questions from a FORM

column.name: FRM_ID
column.comment: The unique identifier for the form

column.name: EXTRNL_QUESTION_ID
column.comment: The externally stored unique identifier for a question

column.name: EXTRNL_RESP_DEF_ID
column.comment: The externally stored unique identifier for a response definition

column.name: EXTRNL_SELC_DEF_ID
column.comment: The externally stored unique identifier for a selection definition

column.name: STRING_VALUE
column.comment: The answer to the question in string format

column.name: TEXT_VALUE
column.comment: The answer to the question in text format

column.name: NUMBER_VALUE
column.comment: The answer to the question in numeric format

column.name: DATE_VALUE
column.comment: The answer to the question in date format

column.name: COMMENT_VALUE
column.comment: The comment to the answer to the question

column.name: UPDATE_STAMP
column.comment: The number of times the record was modified

column.name: FQA_ID
column.comment: The unique identifier for an answer to a form's question
